title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4122.11 - Notice to pari-mutuel manager before wagering opens
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4122.11 - Notice to pari-mutuel manager before wagering opens

State Regulations

The manager of the pari-mutuel department shall be
properly and timely advised by the presiding judge, prior to the beginning of
wagering on each race, of the horses that will compete in the race and any
driver changes from those listed in the official program. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4122.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
